snippet: A new Procter & Gamble co-branding campaign has an Old Spice pitchman interrupt commercials for Charmin and Bounce products.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column; Procter & Gamble launches a co-branding campaign that inserts an Old Spice pitchman into commercials for other products from the company like Charmin toilet paper and Bounce fabric softener; advertisements break from traditional co-branding efforts, creating what industry experts say is a smart, fresh approach.
lead_paragraph: A new Procter & Gamble co-branding campaign has an Old Spice pitchman interrupt commercials for Charmin and Bounce products.

headline.seo: A Brand Too Strong to Stay in Its Own Ad
headline.main: A Brand Too Strong to Stay in Its Own Ad
headline.print_headline: A Brand Too Strong to Stay in Its Own Ad
